item.description: Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1517; 08:21PM; 19309 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zn4mIh; Tarzana; FIRE NOW OUT: Original 9-1-1 call received at 8:08PM. The two story strip mall had nothing showing up on the arrival of the first fire companies. During their investigation, they located fire in one unit. An aggressive fire attack extinguished the fire in 13 minutes and prevented it from extending into the adjoining businesses. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E273 E293 E72 E83 E93 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1397; 07:37PM; 1711 E 15th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q6QuZe; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the fire in 45 minutes with no injuries reported. Once the bulk of the blaze was out, firefighters transitioned to the offensive mode to reach the remaining pockets of fire on the 2nd floor. The fire was prevented from extending beyond the building of origin. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 CM20 CM22 E1 E10 E17 E2 E209 E210 E215 E221 E4 E9 EA1 RA17 T10 T15 T21 T9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1397; 07:20PM; 1711 E 15th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q6QuZe; Downtown; Firefighters remain in the defensive mode with the 2nd floor of the building well involved. Crews are also defending a neighboring pallet yard and building from damage. One additional task force requested (reflected in this alert). No injuries reported. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E17 E2 E209 E210 E4 T10 T9 E9 LF15 E10 CM22; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1397; 06:52PM; 1711 E 15th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q6QuZe; Downtown; One story, vacant commercial building with the first floor well involved in fire. There is at least one additional building and a pallet yard exposed. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E209 E210 E4 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1124; 04:24PM; 2741 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Qa6ytf; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is vacant and the primary/secondary searches did not locate anyone in the building. The fire was prevented from extending into the attic. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC18 BC5 E211 E220 E35 E52 E6 RA10 RA56 T11 T20; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1124; 04:07PM; 2741 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Qa6ytf; Westlake; One story, commercial building with moderate smoke showing. The building is estimated to be 50' x 75' and appears to be vacant. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 E211 E220 E35 E52 E6 T11 T20; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Cliff, Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#1051; 03:17PM; 23621 W Woolsey Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J1IAfP; Chatsworth Reservoir; The patient, approximately 30yo male, determined deceased on scene and no other were patients located in or around the vehicle. Firefighters will remain on scene until law enforcement / LA County Coroner take over the scene and will assist with body recovery as required. Media queries on this incident are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 2886. No further details. ; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 BC15 BC17 E105 E288 E289 E296 E89 E90 EM15 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 HR3 RA96 RH114 T88 T89 T96 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#1051; 03:17PM; 23621 W Woolsey Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J1IAfP; Chatsworth Reservoir; One vehicle down cliff side approximately 50' with one patient reportedly ejected and in unknown condition. ; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 BC15 BC17 E105 E288 E289 E296 E89 E90 EM15 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 HR3 RA96 RH114 T88 T89 T96 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Sheared Hydrant; INC#0949; 02:15PM; 7829 W Melrose Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PT7x1q; Fairfax; LAFD shut down a sheared hydrant (result of a traffic collision) which is impacted the roof of a commercial building (no structural collapse). There is estimated to be 2' of standing water on the roof of the building and also water within the building (unknown amount/damage at this time). Firefighters are working to dewater the roof and then transition to inside the building. LA Dept of Water and Power are notified. There are no reported injuries from the collision. No further details and no further updates anticipated.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; E227 E27 E41 RA61 T27 UR27; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0736; 12:36PM; 4724 W Elmwood Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OQeC1i; Larchmont; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes. The building type is updated to a two story four-plex. The fire appeared to originate in an area under the external stairs (illegally enclosed ?) in which there was a male occupant. The fire was prevented from extending into the structure. The male patient is estimated to be 30-40 years old and was transported in serious condition with burn injuries / smoke inhalation. LAFD Arson investigators are responding. No further details. ; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC5 E226 E227 E229 E52 E6 RA35 RA52 T26 T27 T29; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart
